title: 2.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Based on research, recommendations suggest that adult men consume no more than 36 grams of added sugar daily, while adult women should limit their intake to 35 grams daily.
Develop a program that prompts users to input the quantity of added sugar (measured in grams) they have consumed during a specific day. Utilizing a boolean condition with a threshold of 30 grams, determine whether the user is within a range where they can consume more sugar.
Here is what your output should look like:
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
